sn33.4:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn33.4:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.4:1.4: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.4:1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti?
sn33.4:1.6: “Sankharesu kho, vaccha, annana, sankharasamudaye annana, sankharanirodhe annana, sankharanirodhagaminiya patipadaya annana;
sn33.4:1.8: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.4:1.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati vati.
sn33.4:1.10: Ayam kho, vaccha, hetu, ayam paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.4:1.11: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.4:1.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti.
